introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this section is きげん, which you will often hear in casual conversations and when discussing emotions or trying to gauge someone's emotional state.
meaning_explanation_english: The word きげん means "mood" or "temper". It can refer to someone's emotional state at a particular time, such as when someone is happy, sad, or angry. Additionally, it can describe whether a person is in a good mood or a bad mood.
kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonyms: 感情 : かんじょう : emotion
synonym_explanation: The most common synonym of the word きげん is かんじょう. While きげん specifically refers to the mood or temper at a particular moment, かんじょう is broader and relates to feelings and emotions more generally.
antonyms: 平静 : へいせい : calm
antonym_explanation: The most common antonym of the word きげん is へいせい. While きげん describes fluctuating emotions like being happy or angry, へいせい refers to a calm, composed, and steady state, devoid of mood swings.

example_sentences.furigana: 彼女(かのじょ)はいい機嫌(きげん)です。

translations.EN: She is in a good mood.
translations.ID: Dia sedang dalam suasana hati yang baik.
translations.VI: Cô ấy đang trong tâm trạng tốt.
translations.MY: သူမသည် ရင်ခုန်မှု ကောင်းကောင်းရှိသည်။

example_sentences.furigana: 彼女(かのじょ)は悪(わる)い機嫌(きげん)です。

translations.EN: She is in a bad mood.
translations.ID: Dia sedang dalam suasana hati yang buruk.
translations.VI: Cô ấy đang trong tâm trạng xấu.
translations.MY: သူမသည် စိတ်ပျက်နေသည်။

example_sentences.kanji: 私の犬はいつも機嫌がいいです。
example_sentences.furigana: 私(わたし) の犬(いぬ) はいつも機嫌(きげん) がいいです。

translations.EN: My dog is always in a good mood.
translations.ID: Anjing saya selalu dalam suasana hati yang baik.
translations.ES: Mi perro siempre está de buen humor.
translations.VI: Con chó của tôi luôn vui vẻ.
translations.FR: Mon chien est toujours de bonne humeur.
translations.BN: আমার কুকুরটি সবসময় ভালো মেজাজে থাকে।
translations.TL: Palaging nasa magandang mood ang aking aso.
translations.MY: ကျွန်ုပ်၏ခွေးသည် အမြဲကောင်းမွန်သောခံစားချိန်ရှိပါသည်။
translations.HI: मेरा कुत्ता हमेशा अच्छे मूड में रहता है।
translations.FA: سگ من همیشه حالش خوب است.

example_sentences.kanji: 彼は今日は機嫌が悪いです。
example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)は今(きょう)日は機嫌(きげん)が悪(わる)いです。

translations.EN: He is in a bad mood today.
translations.ID: Dia sedang dalam suasana hati yang buruk hari ini.
translations.ES: Él está de mal humor hoy.
translations.VI: Hôm nay anh ấy có tâm trạng xấu.
translations.FR: Il est de mauvaise humeur aujourd'hui.
translations.MY: သူ့ရဲ့ သဘောထားက ယနေ့အကြောင်းပြချက်မရှိဘူး။
translations.HI: वह आज बुरे मूड में है।

humour.MY: အပြုံး : သရဖူ

safety.MY: စိတ်နေသဘောထား

in a good mood.ID: Suasana hati: dalam suasana hati baik
in a good mood.VI: Tâm trạng: trong tâm trạng tốt
in a good mood.MY: စိတ်ခံစားမှု: စိတ်နေကောင်းသည်
